message: Hi Bob, I have a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $20000. This is a fair price considering its worth to me, but I'm open to negotiating. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value you place on the product, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $15000 for it. Would you be willing to negotiate down to this amount?

Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product and your offer.  While $15000 is the minimum I'd consider, I'm willing to meet you halfway.  How about $17500? This gives us both a fair deal and allows me to continue to see some return on the value I place on this product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I am comfortable with an offer of $16000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
